headline.main: Addicted to Apps

headline.main: Daily Report: Chinese Mobile Phone Company Poaches Google Executive

headline.main: Chinese Smartphone Maker Hires Google Executive
headline.print_headline: A Leader of Google’s Android System Is Hired by a Chinese Smartphone Maker

docs.abstract: Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi announces that it has hired top Google executive Hugo Barra to lead its international expansion plans; analysts say Barra is one of most prominent Westerners to join a Chinese technology company, and that acquisition is sign of rising export ambitions of the Chinese mobile phone industry.
